Not much actual bumfighting here. All of the fights are with what looks like high school kids. There is one scene where a bum gets knocked down, but that is a scene with voulenteer bums. That being said, the rest of the tape is hilarious, with a lot of ridiculing of bums, and other crazy stunts. And about the "bloody pulps", the fights always stops when one is down on the ground, and the worst i saw was some bruises and nosebleed.
